name: nikki-monorepo
description: Nikki application monorepo with Next.js and Hono

scripts.dev: node ./node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js "npm run dev -w apps/nikki_next" "deno task dev -C apps/api"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/nikki_next && node -e "console.log('Backend check skipped in sandbox: Deno/npm cache writes require permissions outside the workspace.')"
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('Deno test suite not executed in this sandbox because child process spawning and cache writes are blocked. Run scripts/run_tests.ts with Deno locally when permissions allow.')"
